title: Creative Risk-Promoting Design Thinking-Based Mathematics Instructional Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Mathematics Pedagogy and Basic Digital Tool Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented course to strengthen creative problem-solving in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can generate three or more creative ideas using design thinking techniques during mathematical problem-solving processes.
Learners can design instructional innovation strategies through dynamic decision-making processes in resource-constrained environments.
Learners can derive five strategies for improving future instructional design by analyzing failure cases.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
